email_content:
Hi Emily,

I wanted to share a quick update on how our new curriculum is performing this semester.

Headline Results
• Overall course grades have risen by 12% compared with last term.
• Students are demonstrating stronger critical-thinking and practical application skills in assessments.
• Engagement during hands-on activities and case-study sessions is noticeably higher.

Student Feedback Highlights
• Most students praised the real-world relevance of the material and the balance between theory and practice.
• Hands-on projects and interactive lessons were cited as the biggest contributors to their learning.

Opportunities for Further Improvement
• Several learners felt the leap to the advanced statistics/analytics modules was steep; they asked for additional guidance and review sessions.
• Requests for more interactive workshops and small-group discussions came up repeatedly.

Next Steps
1. Add optional review clinics before advanced assessments.
2. Build two additional workshop days into the next unit.
3. Create short video refreshers for complex topics to support self-paced study.

I have a detailed breakdown of the analysis (including anonymised grade distributions and full feedback excerpts) ready in Notion. Let me know if you’d like access or a deeper dive.

Thanks for your continued support, and please let me know if there are any other metrics you’d like to see.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
